doc:
Jack Earle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Earle 0 Jacob Rheuben Erlich (July 3, 1906 – July 18, 1952), professionally credited as Jack Earle, was an American silent film actor and sideshow performer. Due to acromegalic gigantism, Earle was one of the world's tallest humans at the time of his death, standing at 8 ft 6 1/2in tall. For 14 years, he traveled with Ringling Bros. and Barnum Bailey Circus, then became a salesman. He is referenced in Tom Waits's song "Get Behind The Mule". Jacob_Rheuben_Erlich ( July_3_,_1906 – July_18_,_1952 ) , professionally_credited as Jack_Earle , was an_American_silent_film_actor_and_sideshow_performer . Due to acromegalic_gigantism , Earle was one of the_world 's_tallest_humans at the_time of his_death , standing at 8_ft_6 1/2 in tall . For 14_years , he traveled with Ringling_Bros. and Barnum_ , then became a_salesman . He is_referenced in Tom_Waits 's_song " Get Behind The_Mule_" .
